short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monetize your creativity seamlessly across platforms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zenrizon is a browser extension-based application that integrates with social media platforms like Twitter and Instagram and facilitates the seamless purchasing transactions of digital content, while disincentivize piracy.
